search_results.title: David Jesudason
search_results.snippet: David Jesudason is a British-Asian freelance journalist who was named Beer Writer of the Year in 2023 by the British Guild of Beer Writers.

search_results.title: David Jesudason - Writing Portfolio
search_results.snippet: Written on my body ... Writer David Jesudason traces the stories behind the marks on his body, from healed acne, a large birthmark, and scars from racist attacks.

search_results.title: The big interview: David Jesudason
search_results.snippet: Author, journalist and the first BAME winner of Beer Writer of the Year, David Jesudason tells Jessica Mason how desi pubs can teach us so much about community ...
